players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, did you investigate Bob? If so, what did you find?"
Diana: "Alice, you are the mafia. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Bob was killed by you."
You: "I didn't investigate Bob. I suspect Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob was killed. You claim you didn't investigate him, yet Diana says you are mafia. I trust Diana. Vote Alice."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice, you killed Bob. I'm the detective. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, did you investigate Bob? If so, what did you find?"
You: "Alice, you are the mafia. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Bob was killed by you."
Alice: "I didn't investigate Bob. I suspect Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob was killed. You claim you didn't investigate him, yet Diana says you are mafia. I trust Diana. Vote Alice."
Alice: remained silent.
You: "Alice, you killed Bob. I'm the detective. Vote Alice."
